data.text:
Nitara Carlyn Long is a professional actress who goes by the stage name Nia Long. She was nominated for Black Reel Awards and Image Awards for her work in various films and television series. She is also a music video director, with credits including “This Too Shall Pass” and “Baby.” Let’s learn more about her by reading this article.

How much is Nia Long worth?

Nia Long has a respectable amount of money and popularity as a result of her acting career in the entertainment sector. Her current net worth is reported to be $13 million, according to certain web sources. She also made money from her endorsement deals from Elizabeth Taylor White Diamonds Fragrance and Target. However, her income and assets are not yet revealed.

Where is Nia Long now?

Nia was born in 1970 to her parents, Doughtry Long and Talita Long, in Brooklyn, New York, United States, making her 52 years old at the time. Her mother is a teacher and printmaker, while her father is a high school teacher and poet.

Her parents separated when she was two years old and her mother eventually moved to Iowa City, Iowa with her older half-sister, Sommore, to raise her. She is also of American descent and belongs to the African-American ethnic group. Her zodiac sign is Scorpio and she is a Christian.

She received her education at St. Mary’s Academy and then attended Paseo Del Rey Elementary School from grades 3 to 6. She then transferred to Westchester High School in Los Angeles where she received her diploma in 1989. She also took ballet, tap, jazz, gymnastics, guitar, and acting lessons in addition to her academic studies.

Has Nia been married for a long time?

As for her personal life, Nia Long has never been married, but she has been engaged twice. After two years of dating, she got engaged to Massai Z. Dorsey in 2001. In 2000, the couple gave birth to a son named Massai Zhivago Dorsey II.

However, after ten months of dating, the couple divorced. After that, in 2015, he married Ime Udoka. The couple has been together since 2009 and is still going strong. In 2011, the couple had their son, Kez Sunday Udoka. Currently, the couple is having a happy life together and their vows will be exchanged soon.

Chris Tucker, Alfonso Ribeiro, 50 Cent, Peter Thomas, Kendu Isaacs (1992), Chris Webber (1993–95), Will Smith (1995), Mick Jagger (2004), Kevin Phillips (2006), Dwight Freeney (2006), Cuttino Mobley (2007), and Joel Gonzales were among the superstars she previously dated (2008).
